title: Firefox keeps blocking pop-up windows even after I disabled it
content: You can see from the first image that I had unchecked the "Block pop-up windows". But then if a page wants to pop up the windows like running "for(let i = 0; i < 24; i++) window.open("about:blank")", the result will be the second image. Firefox still keeps blocking despite my setting. And there is no even option like "allow the pop-ups" in the Options menus on the info bar.

title: Firefox does not connect anymore to Google services
content: Hello! Since a month I have a strange problem - Firefox wont connect to any Google service - REcaptcha, google-analytics. Any site that uses these services would not load, or loads and waits until connection expires. I tried refreshing Firefox, the uninstalling and re-installing - the problem remains. I do not use any proxy or firewall on my computer. Opera and other browsers do not have this problem. Please, advice.

title: windows validation errors after installing the current mozilla firefox browser update.
content:
I am using a win 7 home premium 64 bit laptop Dell XPS. I cannot afford a new computer or as someone trained in computer graphics (before I became disabled) I would. After installing the latest moxilla firefox browser updat last night I shut down my computer as usual. Today upon trying to get my laptop to boot I started getting windows software validation errors. I had not done any software updates except that new firefox update so there is no question what caused the problem. I managed to get a temp resolution by using my last restore point. Now I love firefox as my preferred browser (99% of the time, but I am concerned that the validation errors will start again if I install the current update. Anyone else seen anything like this? Or have a fix?

I always keep my software including my antiviral up to date.

Not sure what data I could share, or if its even relevant) because I had to use a restore point to get my computer to validate my 100% genuine windows software. I dont know if either the raw data or report would even be helpful so providing both.
creator: aeld379

title: Unbelievably slow Google Drive upload speeds compared to Edge / Chrome
content:
I have gigabit fiber and I just tried to upload about 40gb to gDrive on Firefox (which I recently switched to from Edge). It said it was going to take about 3 hours ....?!?!

I cancelled after 5 minutes and did the exact same file upload on Edge browser...the whole upload took about 12 minutes.

3 hours...vs...12 minutes


What is this? This alone destroys Firefox for me if it's unfixable
creator: nogills

title: Connecting to a website can be a problem
content: It's difficult to access a particular webpage on the internet. I get a blank page when I click on this link: It is a popular mobile locksmith in Cincinnati, Ohio. The website is up and running because I can connect to it using another PC at home. How do I check what messages are sent from my Firefox browser to the website? And then - what is received at my browser from the website? By the way, I have cleared the cache and restarted FF, but I still cannot connect to it. There are other websites that I need help with displaying and interacting properly. How do I know this? - Well - I tried the 3 other websites from other PCs within my home network, and these websites work properly
